prompt:
THEME: Tropical Island Paradise

STYLE:
- Bright sunny beaches, palm trees, turquoise water
- Tiki/bamboo architecture, tropical flowers
- Vibrant vacation vibes, relaxed atmosphere
- Caribbean/Hawaiian resort aesthetic

ASSET DETAILS:
- Grass: FLAT sandy beach tile only - golden sand texture, no trees or structures
- House: Beach bungalow with thatched roof, hammock, surfboard
- Shop: Tiki bar with bamboo, tropical drinks, string lights
- Park: Pool area with waterfall, lounge chairs, umbrellas
- University: Oceanography center with aquariums, research boats
- Market: Beach market with fruit stands, souvenir shops, ice cream
